amendment.description: To clarify the allowable costs standards for public-use airport projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 37 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 37 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Klobuchar. (consideration: CR S830-833) To clarify the allowable costs standards for public-use airport projects.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 37 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 37 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Klobuchar.
